About Me

Fourth year computer science major at The University of Chicago. Originally from the Bay Area. My passions are technology, programming, design, music, crossfit, mma and surfing in no particular order. My dream is to make a career out of any combination of these. If you think you have a job or task I might be right for, or you just want to chat, please feel free to contact me.


Surfscrape

A python script that uses the beautifulsoup library to scrape data on surf conditions from Surfline.com. When conditions at my home break are favorable it sends text message updates to me and my friends that include the current conditions and a motivational message. I used the apscheduler library to make the script run once every 24 hours indefinitely.

BeatsByAndrey

An experiment on the randomness of lyrics. Basically a python module that uses a sweet multi-threaded web scraper to get lyrics from Genius.com coupled with a markov chain generator all in the form of a web application. Built on Django, hosted on Heroku.

PeerProof

An online platform for students to both proof read others academic papers and have their papers proof read. Built on Rails, hosted on Heroku.

Crossfit Calculator

An iOS app that includes a tabata timer in addition to a max weight percentage calculator and graphing of max weights.
